response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would greatly benefit your endeavors. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value, making it an attractive proposition for you. We hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how this product could enhance your business or personal projects. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 1350000}
